**Describe the bug / 问题描述**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

> [!NOTE]
> Please search for related **[ISSUES](https://github.com/prinsss/twitter-web-exporter/issues)** and **[PULL REQUESTS](https://github.com/prinsss/twitter-web-exporter/pulls)** before creating a new one.
> 在提交新的 Bug 之前，请先搜索确认是否已存在类似问题。

**To Reproduce / 复现步骤**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

**Expected behavior / 实际行为**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

**Screenshots / 截图**
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

**Logs / 日志**
If applicable, add logs to help explain your problem.

1. Turn on the "Debug" switch in the "Settings" page.
<small>请在脚本设置页面中打开「调试开关」。</small>
2. Press F12 to open the developer tools and go to the "Console" tab.
<small>按 F12 打开开发者工具并切换到「控制台」标签。</small>
3. Refresh the page and reproduce the issue.
<small>刷新页面并复现上述问题。</small>
4. Check the logs in the console and copy them here with sensitive information redacted.
<small>查看控制台中的日志并复制到此处，如有敏感信息注意打码。</small>

**Environment / 环境信息**
 - OS: [e.g. Windows, iOS]
 - Browser: [e.g. Chrome 141, Safari 18]
 - Version of twitter-web-exporter: [e.g. 1.4.0]

**Additional context / 附加信息**
Add any other context about the problem here.
